pageContext.claim: “I really appreciate their statement. Their statement was excellent. [Gary Cohn and Rob Porter released statements pushing back on the book 'Fear.'] And they both said that beautiful, which shows that the book is just a piece of fiction.”
pageContext.analysis: Neither Cohn nor Porter denied the specific events in Bob Woodward's book. Cohn said the book did not describe his experience in the White House accurately, without giving details of what was inaccurate. Porter called the book "selective and misleading," but did not deny anything in specific.
